message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also my desire to ensure it goes to someone who appreciates its true value. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
